title: Do Champ Shards Lose Value?
body:
I have a Zoe champ shard for +1260 and don't want to cash it in right now.

If Zoe decreases in cost will the shard also?

replies.body: Yes shards do decrease in cost when the champion goes down in value, no it won't affect Zoe at all any time soon.
When I joined in season 2, Ziggs was the newest champ out. He's only dropped one price tier since then, so I don't think you need to worry.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083304-Permanent-Champion-Price-Reduction

Here is the list if anyone want's it.

I guess the would but Zoe won't decrease till a heap of champions are released.
i.e Zed only just moved from 6300 to 4800 and he was released in Nov 2012 so at the current rate zoe will become cheaper in 5 years
